item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 West (Idaho Street) approaching NV-225 North (Mountain City Highway and Silver St.). Use NV-225 north (Mountain City Highway) to Boise (Idaho). Continue west on BL-80/NV-535 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225/To I-80
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.) approaching NV-225/ To I-80 (Mountain City Highway) in Elko. The sign shows NV-225 straight ahead, but it should have a right arrow.

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West - Idaho St.
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 West/To I-80 on Idaho St. in Elko.

item.title: NV-227 North at BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.)
item.description: NV-227 North (5th St.) at BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.) in Elko. Use BL-80/NV-535 West for NV-225; use BL-80 for I-80.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80 East at I-80 West (Exit 303). Turn left for I-80 west to Reno.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80
item.description: BL-80 East at I-80 (Exit 303) in Elko.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80 (Exit 303)
item.description: BL-80 East at I-80 (Exit 303) in Elko. Turn right for I-80 east to Salt Lake City (UT); continue under freeway for I-80 west to Reno.

item.title: BL-80 East (Idaho St.) at Jennings Way to I-80
item.description: BL-80 East (Idaho St.) at Jennings Way to I-80. Turn left for Jennings Way and I-80 onramps.

item.title: BL-80 East (Idaho St.) Approaching I-80
item.description: BL-80 East (Idaho St.) approaching I-80 to Salt Lake (UT) and Reno.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 303 Offramp
item.description: I-80 West Exit 303 Offramp at BL-80. Turn left for BL-80 (Jennings Way).

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 303
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 303 - Elko East.

item.title: I-80 West - Business Loop
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 303. Use Exit 303 for BL-80 Business Loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 303
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 303 - Elko East.

item.title: BL-80 West (Jennings Way) at Idaho St.
item.description: BL-80 West (Jennings Way) at Idaho St. Turn right to continue west on BL-80 and for Ruby Mountain Recreation Areas: Lamoille Canyon, South Fork State Park, and Ruby Valley NWR.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 303
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 303 - Elko East.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 303
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 303. Use Exit 303 for Ruby Mountain Recreation Areas.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225 (To I-80)
item.description: BL-80 West at NV-225 North. Continue west on BL-80 (Idaho St.) for I-80.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225
item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho Street) at NV-225 North. Use NV-225 north to Boise. Continue west on BL-80 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: BL-80 West To NV-225/I-80
item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho St.), to NV-225 and I-80.

item.title: End NV-227 at BL-80 (Idaho St.)
item.description: End NV-227 west at BL-80 (Idaho St.) in downtown Elko. Use Idaho St. for access to I-80. Use Idaho St. west for access to NV-225.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80 in Elko
item.description: Eastern end of Elko I-80 business loop at I-80 junction to Reno and Salt Lake

item.title: BL-80 West - Elko
item.description: BL-80 Shield on Idaho Street

item.title: BL-80 West - Elko City Offices
item.description: Sign for Elko City Offices on BL-80 West

item.title: BL-80 West at Idaho St. - Elko
item.description: BL-80 Shield at approaching Idaho Street

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225
item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho Street) at NV-225 North. Use NV-225 north to Boise. Continue west on BL-80 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225 (To I-80)
item.description: BL-80 West at NV-225 North. Continue west on BL-80 to access I-80.

item.description: BL-80 West at NV-227 Junction
